mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, password, fullname, phone, email, status, group_id) VALUES (#{username},#{password} , #{fullname}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{status}, #{group_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET password = #{password}, fullname = #{fullname} ,phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, status = #{status}, group_id = #{group_id} WHERE username = #{username}
